languages.text: "Незримая тень, слуга смерти... Матушка называла ее Нааки, но я понимала, что она обращается к кому-то... кого знала".

traits.locale_text: "Незримая тень, слуга смерти... Матушка называла ее Нааки, но я понимала, что она обращается к кому-то... кого знала".

languages.text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
languages.original_text: "Незримая тень, слуга смерти... Матушка называла ее Нааки, но я понимала, что она обращается к кому-то... кого знала".

traits.locale_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of the Undying One... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of the Undying One... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of the Undying One... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
"An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

languages.text: « Une ombre invisible. Une servante de la mort... Mère l'appelait Naaki, mais j'ai vite compris qu'elle parlait à... quelqu'un qu'elle avait connu. »
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

traits.locale_text: « Une ombre invisible. Une servante de la mort... Mère l'appelait Naaki, mais j'ai vite compris qu'elle parlait à... quelqu'un qu'elle avait connu. »

languages.text: «Una sombra invisible. Una sirviente de la muerte... Madre la llamaba Naaki, pero sabía que hablaba con... alguien que ya conocía».
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

traits.locale_text: «Una sombra invisible. Una sirviente de la muerte... Madre la llamaba Naaki, pero sabía que hablaba con... alguien que ya conocía».

languages.text: 「見えない影。死の使い…母さんはその人をナアキと呼んでいたけど、知っていました…母さんは知っている誰かに話しかけていたって」
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

traits.locale_text: 「見えない影。死の使い…母さんはその人をナアキと呼んでいたけど、知っていました…母さんは知っている誰かに話しかけていたって」

languages.text: “那是看不到的影子，是死亡的仆从……妈妈说那个人叫做拿基，但我看得出来，那个人……她认识。”
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

traits.locale_text: “那是看不到的影子，是死亡的仆从……妈妈说那个人叫做拿基，但我看得出来，那个人……她认识。”

languages.text: "Ein unsichtbarer Schatten. Eine Dienerin des Todes ... Mutter nannte sie Naaki, doch ich wusste, sie sprach mit ... jemandem, den sie kannte."
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."

traits.locale_text: "Ein unsichtbarer Schatten. Eine Dienerin des Todes ... Mutter nannte sie Naaki, doch ich wusste, sie sprach mit ... jemandem, den sie kannte."

languages.text: "Görünmeyen bir gölge, ölümün bir hizmetkârı... Annem ona Naaki derdi ama ben... Tanıdığı biriyle konuştuğunu biliyordum."
languages.original_text: "An unseen shadow. A servant of death... Mother called her Naaki, but I knew she was talking to... someone she knew."
